column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Man!  This place has great food and awesome service.  Terry was the best waiter.  Porkbelly Poutine
column2: oh my slap my thigh redonkulousness.  Avocado salad was  creamy and refreshing.  Bosscat burger was good.  Fried potatoes were amazing and even the ketchup had lil spicy tang that made you say-dang thats good! Ya da boss
